name: CutGun Pre-Alpha
description:
CutGun is a 3D first person shooter. 

In which you have to visit different maps. In the Crazy Office or on other maps. The game has cool physics and destructible objects. Both simple and advanced AI will interfere with you. The game has a simple style. Let's say a pyramid is a first aid kit. The controls are simple. 

W A S D - move. Spase - Jump. TAB - Pull the hook with the cat. LMB - Shoot. Mouse wheel - Adjust the cut of object
